Process done by TOC Hi, my name is Arjun Kejriwal, a recent graduate of the Dhirubhai Ambani International School and an incoming freshman at Amherst College, USA. I was admitted to several top-tier universities like Amherst College, Duke University, UC Berkeley, and USC, while also receiving full scholarship at two of them: Amherst and USC.
